title: Modeling and Calibration of Supplier Selection Problem in Freight Agent-Based Simulations
summary: Freight transportation modeling often struggles with data limitations, especially in accurately representing complex supplier selection processes and their impact on network flows. This research addresses this critical gap by developing a large-scale, calibrated agent-based model for supplier selection, complemented by a probabilistic heuristic for international shipments.
